name: King Soccer
description:
Welcome to the King Soccer world tournament 2014, the new exciting 3D single&multiplayer(*) soccer game for your device.
Select your favorite national team (among the 32 ones playing the world tournament), practice with friendly matches, enter the tournament, and/or play online with your friends around the world!
GAME FEATURES
• The first and (so far) only real-time multiplayer game multidevice
• Enjoy online or single player matches, and the full world tournament.
• Free to play! Hundreds of hours of entertainment at your fingertips!
• Super addictive, exciting mix between simulation and arcade
• Real Soccer Game for your device
• Very easy (just one "action" button) and responsive game controls
• Realistic sounds and stunning 3D graphics
It's 100% full featured and free!
These are the included teams: Brazil, Croatia, Mexico, Cameroon, Spain, Netherlands, Chile, Australia, Colombia, Greece, Cote d'Ivoire, Japan, Uruguay, Costa Rica, England, Italy, Switzerland, Ecuador, France, Honduras, Argentina, Bosnia Herzegovina, Iran, Nigeria, Germany, Portugal, Ghana, Usa, Belgium, Algeria, Russia and Korea Republic.

(*) multiplayer is available only for devices with firmware 6.0 or higher, using wifi or data connection.
